healer.title: AI Healer
healer.noOpenaiKey: OpenAI API key required for AI features

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.inputScatterDesc: Each point represents an execution projected into 2D via PCA. Nearby points have similar input vectors. Color: cyan = success, red = error, lime = cache hit.
analysis.bottleneckDesc: Executions are clustered by vector similarity using KMeans. Clusters with avg duration 2x+ above overall average are flagged as bottlenecks (red).
analysis.errorClustersDesc: Error executions are grouped by semantic similarity. Each cluster represents a pattern of similar failures across functions.
analysis.coverageDesc: Compares golden dataset vectors vs execution vectors. Higher score means your golden records cover more input patterns.
analysis.discoveryDesc: Far from existing golden records — covers unexplored input regions.
analysis.steadyDesc: Near existing golden records — reinforces well-tested patterns.
analysis.recommendDesc: Discovery candidates add coverage in new areas; Steady candidates reinforce existing patterns. Diversity Score shows how much new coverage each candidate adds.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Select a Weaviate connection to get started
projects.quickStartBannerDesc: Follow the quick setup guide to connect your first Weaviate instance.

onboarding.q2: Do you already have a Weaviate instance?
onboarding.q3: Would you like to use Weaviate Cloud?
onboarding.introDesc: VectorWave is a Python SDK that records every function call as a vector in Weaviate. It enables semantic caching, distributed tracing, drift detection, and AI-powered self-healing — all with a single @vectorize decorator.
onboarding.endReadyDesc: Your Weaviate instance is ready. Go back and add your connection details.
onboarding.wcsStep2: Copy the REST URL and API Key from the cluster details page.
onboarding.wcsStep3: Come back and create a WCS Cloud connection.
onboarding.dockerStep3: Come back and create a Self Hosted connection.
onboarding.wcsRestDesc: Used for HTTP API calls. Found on your cluster details page.
onboarding.wcsGrpcDesc: Used for faster data operations (bulk import, vector search).
onboarding.wcsApiKeyDesc: Authentication token. Create one in cluster details → API Keys.
onboarding.wcsWhereToFind: In WCS Console: Clusters → your cluster → Details tab
onboarding.wcsConnectTip: The VectorSurfer connection form fields map directly to these endpoints.
onboarding.dockerComposeContent:
version: '3.4'
services:
  weaviate:
    command:
    - --host
    - 0.0.0.0
    - --port
    - '8080'
    - --scheme
    - http
    image: semitechnologies/weaviate:1.26.1
    ports:
    - 8080:8080
    - 50051:50051
    restart: on-failure:0
    environment:
      QUERY_DEFAULTS_LIMIT: 25
      AUTHENTICATION_ANONYMOUS_ACCESS_ENABLED: 'true'
      PERSISTENCE_DATA_PATH: '/var/lib/weaviate'
      DEFAULT_VECTORIZER_MODULE: 'none'
      ENABLE_MODULES: 'text2vec-openai,generative-openai'
      CLUSTER_HOSTNAME: 'node1'
onboarding.dockerVerifyDesc: Should return JSON with Weaviate version info.
onboarding.dockerConnectTip: Come back and create a Self Hosted connection with the default ports.
onboarding.installWhatIs: VectorWave wraps your functions with @vectorize to enable tracing, caching, and AI healing.
onboarding.installPipDesc: Installs the SDK and its dependencies.
onboarding.installEnvWcs:
# Weaviate Cloud connection
WEAVIATE_URL=https://<your-cluster>.weaviate.network
WEAVIATE_API_KEY=<your-api-key>

# Vectorizer (choose one)
VECTORWAVE_VECTORIZER=huggingface    # Free, local
# VECTORWAVE_VECTORIZER=openai_client  # Better quality

# Optional: OpenAI for AI features
# OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...
onboarding.installEnvDocker:
# Local Weaviate
WEAVIATE_URL=http://localhost:8080

# Vectorizer (choose one)
VECTORWAVE_VECTORIZER=huggingface    # Free, local
# VECTORWAVE_VECTORIZER=openai_client  # Better quality

# Optional: OpenAI for AI features
# OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-...
onboarding.installInitDesc: Creates 4 Weaviate collections: Functions, Executions, GoldenDataset, TokenUsage.
onboarding.installTestDesc: If this prints without errors, everything is working.

account.title: Account
account.showQuickStartDesc: Display the setup guide banner on the Projects page
